CutSceneText.Text: Long ago, Aion was served by great beings of stone known as Jotun.
I thought the Jotun were lost in the cataclysm,
but from looking at this Balaur document, I guess I was wrong!
This document says the Dragonbound were ordered
to steal the Power Source of some ancient weapon from the Jotun.
I'm not sure what the Balaur are plotting,
but I'm sure it's not good for us.
The Jotun will not like it...
...but you must recover that Power Source before the Dragonbound do.
